56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Malik bin Al-Huwairith:On my departure from the Prophet (ﷺ) he said to me and to a friend of mine, "You two, pronounce the Adhan and the Iqama for the prayer and let the elder of you lead the prayer

chapter.eng-name: The travelling of two persons together
